response.original_title: ドキュメント「超」怖い話 ～都市伝説編～4
response.overview: To make sure he gets the right ghost photos, Yumei Hirayama, a guide of the bizarre, visits haunted places and birthplaces of urban legends scattered throughout the Hokuriku region. The ruins of an actual inn in Toyama Prefecture... Gravestones in Ishikawa Prefecture, where an urban legend-type curse has been handed down... Tojinbo in Fukui Prefecture, a famous suicide spot... The island 'Ojima' where the bodies of Tojinbo suicide victims always wash ashore. ...How is the result of the ghost photography tour that visited places where the probability of taking ghost photos is abnormally high based on local interviews and information on the Internet?
response.title: Document Super Scary Story: Urban Legend 4
